game_description: Volleyball Fever is a VR sports game where you can chill out with friends online, or just play solo with bots. Stick your feet in the warm sand next to the blue ocean, play a match in the moonlight, or go inside for those serious matches. Easy to pick up with realistic and intuitive physics.
